About Legend of Arcadia

The next-gen casual strategy card game on the blockchain, featuring diverse game modes and a rich gaming experience

Diverse Game Modes

Experience a variety of interesting gameplay elements, a well-written and fascinating story all while earning rewards

PvE Adventures for Everyone PvP Tournaments for Hardcore Players Even More Surprises
  • Daily Missions:Complete daily tasks and earn rewards
  • Labyrinth:Explore unique dungeons for exciting adventures
  • Adventure:Immerse yourself in a captivating storyline
  • Mining:Send your Toy Heroes on missions to mine White Ore

Why You'll Fall in Love with Legend of Arcadia

We seamlessly blend traditional gameplay with cutting-edge web3 elements, offering an unparalleled gaming experience.

  • Tokenomics

    Pioneering a token model that intricately combines White Ore and Obsidian for $ARCA

  • One Gacha Ball, Trillions Combinations of Toy Heroes

    Unleash endless surprises with countless unique Toy Heroes

    View More

  • Robust Bonding Between $ARCA and In-game Privilege

    Utilize your hard-earned $ARCA to unlock up to 20 VIP levels for a myriad of in-game possibilities

    View More

  • 1st Gamified ERC-6551 (Coming Soon!)

    Engage in liquidity mining by dispatching your NFT Toy Heroes to earn $ARCA rewards

Roadmap

Team to insert latest roadmap timeline milestones

2022 Q4

  • Form Project Concept
  • Determine Game Mechanics
  • Social Media Presence

2023 Q1

  • Launch Official Website
  • Whitepaper Release
  • Closed Alpha Test 1.0

2023 Q2

  • Genesis Gacha Ball NFT
  • Game UI/UX Optimization
  • Closed Alpha Test 2.0

2023 Q3

  • Closed Alpha Test 3.0 & 4.0 on Sui Testnet
  • ERC-6551 New Gameplay Design
  • Smart Contracts Audits

2023 Q4

  • Explore multichain and new ecosystem
  • New partnership and campaign kickoff
  • AI community bot model

2024 H1

  • Open Beta Test
  • 1st Batch of NFT Gacha Ball Sales
  • IAP Features With Tokens

2024 H2

  • Tournament Season Kick-off
  • In-app Purchase
  • More Festive-themed NFT Gacha Ball Sales
  • Available for Google Play & App Store

2025 Future

  • New Gameplay - Homeland
  • Gamefied 6551 Backpack System
  • Guild vs Guild Gamemode
